channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: Hugo Image Gallery
item.description:
Hugo Image Gallery

This script creates an image gallery. The script reads all images from a specific (user-defined) folder in the assets directory of Hugo, automagically crops them to 300px squares and shows them in rows of five.
Beautiful Mountains Museum of Pop Culture Seattle View Seattle by Night Space Needle How it works The script searches for any file in the folder ‘album’ in the assets directory of Hugo. It creates an image tag with a thumbnail for these images. The thumbnail is a 300 pixel wide square cropped version of the image. The script wraps the thumbnail in a link, which links to a larger version and will trigger a lightbox if present. The caption is the file name without extension.
item.content:encoded:
Hugo Image Gallery

This script creates an image gallery. The script reads all images from a specific (user-defined) folder in the assets directory of Hugo, automagically crops them to 300px squares and shows them in rows of five.
Beautiful Mountains Museum of Pop Culture Seattle View Seattle by Night Space Needle How it works The script searches for any file in the folder ‘album’ in the assets directory of Hugo. It creates an image tag with a thumbnail for these images. The thumbnail is a 300 pixel wide square cropped version of the image. The script wraps the thumbnail in a link, which links to a larger version and will trigger a lightbox if present. The caption is the file name without extension.

item.title: Webhook app by Soulteary
item.description:
Webhook app by Soulteary

WebHook is a lightweight and customizable tool written in Go that enables you to effortlessly create HTTP WebHook services. With WebHook, you can execute predefined commands and flexibly pass data from HTTP requests (including headers, body, and parameters) to your configured commands or programs. It also supports triggering hooks based on specific conditions.
This is a fork of the original by adnanh. A more detailed explanation can be found here.
item.content:encoded:
Webhook app by Soulteary

WebHook is a lightweight and customizable tool written in Go that enables you to effortlessly create HTTP WebHook services. With WebHook, you can execute predefined commands and flexibly pass data from HTTP requests (including headers, body, and parameters) to your configured commands or programs. It also supports triggering hooks based on specific conditions.
This is a fork of the original by adnanh. A more detailed explanation can be found here.

item.title: GMKTec M5 Proxmox install problem
item.description:
GMKTec M5 Proxmox install problem

Getting Proxmox to work on GMKTec Nucbox M5 is by setting “NX Mode” to enabled in Advanced > CPU Configuration
This is applicable to M5, but who knows, maybe it is also applicable to GMKTec M5 Plus and other GMKTec products.
item.content:encoded:
GMKTec M5 Proxmox install problem

Getting Proxmox to work on GMKTec Nucbox M5 is by setting “NX Mode” to enabled in Advanced > CPU Configuration
This is applicable to M5, but who knows, maybe it is also applicable to GMKTec M5 Plus and other GMKTec products.

item.title: GMKtec NucBox M5 Plus mini PC review
item.description:
GMKtec NucBox M5 Plus mini PC review

Nothing special from a performance perspective, but the GMKtec NucBox M5 Plus is much better than its relatively low price might infer. Being able to get roughly another 20% from the system using performance mode is also a bonus. Perfect choice for a firewall.
His problems with the unit is more on the features and ports?
item.content:encoded:
GMKtec NucBox M5 Plus mini PC review

Nothing special from a performance perspective, but the GMKtec NucBox M5 Plus is much better than its relatively low price might infer. Being able to get roughly another 20% from the system using performance mode is also a bonus. Perfect choice for a firewall.
His problems with the unit is more on the features and ports?

item.title: GoMFT - Go Managed File Transfer
item.description:
GoMFT - Go Managed File Transfer

GoMFT is a web-based managed file transfer application built with Go, leveraging rclone for robust file transfer capabilities. It provides a user-friendly interface for configuring, scheduling, and monitoring file transfers across various storage providers.
We might need this later, we might not.
item.content:encoded:
GoMFT - Go Managed File Transfer

GoMFT is a web-based managed file transfer application built with Go, leveraging rclone for robust file transfer capabilities. It provides a user-friendly interface for configuring, scheduling, and monitoring file transfers across various storage providers.
We might need this later, we might not.

item.title: LUKS encrypted Debian 12 server (Hetzner)
item.description:
LUKS encrypted Debian 12 server (Hetzner)

In this tutorial I’ll walk you through the steps of setting up Debian 12 with LUKS full disk encryption on a server you bought from the Hetzner auction. I’m using the recommended method using the “installimage” script (that Hetzner provides) to make things really easy for myself.
item.content:encoded:
LUKS encrypted Debian 12 server (Hetzner)

In this tutorial I’ll walk you through the steps of setting up Debian 12 with LUKS full disk encryption on a server you bought from the Hetzner auction. I’m using the recommended method using the “installimage” script (that Hetzner provides) to make things really easy for myself.
